title: Roasted Garlic Haricot Bean Dip
ingredients: ['4 medium heads garlic', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 large onion, peeled and chopped', '1 (400g) tin haricot beans, rinsed and drained', '1 dessertspoon ground cumin', '5 tablespoons soured cream']
